title: 'Quite Nice'
body: Quite soft. Don't know if it is pure wool but it's a nice fit. Slightly short in length but pretty cosy.

title: 'Fit and warm'
body: Go for it without a second thought. It's perfect sweater for winters. I purchased it and was in doubt about the stuff but it turned out to be a perfect peice.
